long_description: The Elmer Fudd-approved REI Buffalo Plaid cap is lined with soft polyester fleece and features warm insulation to keep your head toasty when you're hunting "wabbits" or going for a cold-weather hike. Polyester/wool exterior is lined at the crown with soft polyester microfleece and features a touch of polyester insulation to keep your head toasty warm on cold winter days. Soft polyester sherpa fleece lines the earflaps for excellent warmth and comfort next to skin; tie the earflaps up when you don't need them. REI Buffalo Plaid cap has a small inner drop-down earband that can be used in milder temperatures when you don't need the full protection of the earflaps.
short_description: The Elmer Fudd-approved REI Buffalo Plaid cap is lined with soft polyester fleece and features warm insulation to keep your head toasty when you're hunting "wabbits" or going for a cold-weather hike.
